page.title: 02LAW AND ORDER IN WEST HULL
page.content: WE OBTAINED THIS INFORMATION FROM AN INTERVIEW WITH A POLICE OFFICER, AND FROM THE 1984 POLICE REPORT. THE DIVISION HAS 22% OF HULL'S CRIME BUT ONLY 20% OF IT'S POLICE. VIOLENCE AND SEXUAL OFFENCES ARE AVERAGE, BUT BURGLARY(27%)IS ABOVE,AND THEFT(20%) & DRUGS(7%) ARE BELOW AVERAGE FOR HULL. PAPERWORK TAKES UP MOST POLICE TIME. SHOPLIFTING HAS THE HIGHEST DETECTION RATE AND THEFT THE LOWEST. TWO PROFESIONAL GROUNDS OF RUGBY AND FOOTBALL HAVE SIMILAR SIZE CROWDS,BUT MORE POLICE ARE NEEDED AT FOOTBALL. APART FROM THE HORSE SECTION,DIVING, AND FIRE ARMS POLICE WOMEN DO THE SAME WORK. WEST HULL POLICE STATION IN PRIORY ROAD,BUILT AS A PREFABRICATED UNIT IN 1974 IS LIKELY TO REMAIN BUT HAS THE SAME FACILITIES AS MORE IMPRESSIVE STATIONS IN OTHER PARTS OF HULL.
